boardgame.name: Watson _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Holmes
Watson _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Holmes: Diarios del 221B
Watson _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Holmes: From the Diaries of 221B
カードゲーム ワトソン＆ホームズ
華生和福爾摩斯
boardgame.description: Watson _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Holmes is a game of deduction set within the magnificent works of Arthur Conan Doyle. Two to seven aspiring detectives step into the shoes of Doctor Watson, working alongside the detective Sherlock Holmes to try to solve a series of so far unpublished cases directly extracted from Doctor John H. Watson's diaries. Those who accept the challenge relive the adventures of the crime-solving duo, visiting each of the locations where the inquiries were made. Following the trail, each clue brings players closer to solving the case._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The objective of the game is to immerse yourself in the Victorian world depicted in each story. Visit the right places, decipher the clues, and above all find the path that leads you to solve the mystery before anybody else. Victory goes to the player who accurately uses the deductive reasoning so famously and ingeniously implemented by the hero of 221B Baker Street._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game consists of a series of separate cases, each of which raises a number of questions that each player tries to solve before anyone else. To do this, once the case and the questions have been read aloud, players proceed to visit the locations where the clues are located. Each location cannot be accessed by more than one player at any one time, so if two or more players want to go to the same place, the player who travels there the fastest (i.e., he who uses the largest number of Carriage Tokens) gets the clue, forcing the others to go to a different location. Once every player has a destination, they proceed to read in secret the clue that was discovered at that location. They can discreetly take any notes they deem appropriate. Once this is done, the cards are returned to their place so that others can read them in later turns._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This procedure is repeated during each turn until one player believes he has found the solutions to the case; at that time, he must go to 221B Baker Street to check if his answers are correct. If all the answers are correct, the player wins; if they are wrong, he will have lost and retires from the game, and the game continues._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each detective will also have the invaluable assistance of a number of Sherlock Holmes' allies, above all, the good Dr Watson and of course of the detective himself._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Watson _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Holmes es un juego de deducci_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;oacute;n basado en la admirable obra de Sir Arthur Conan Doyle. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Cada uno de los dos a siete jugadores adoptar_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute; el papel del Dr. John Watson y acompa_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ntilde;ar_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute; a Sherlock Holmes en la investigaci_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;oacute;n de una serie de casos in_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;ditos hasta ahora, intentando resolver cada uno de ellos antes de que el gran detective le brinde la soluci_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;oacute;n correcta. Para ello, cada jugador deber_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute; sumergirse en la Inglaterra victoriana e ir recopilando, en distintas localizaciones, las pistas extra_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;iacute;das de los diarios del propio Dr. Watson, con el fin de encajarlas correctamente por medio de la l_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;oacute;gica deductiva._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Y, todo esto, sin demorarse por el camino, pues solo aqu_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;l que resuelva el misterio antes que sus contrincantes se ganar_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute; la confianza del genio de Baker Street._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;El juego se compone de una serie de casos independientes, cada uno de los cu_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute;les plantea una serie de interrogantes que cada jugador tratar_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute; de resolver antes que los dem_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute;s._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Para ello, una vez se lean el caso y las preguntas en voz alta, los jugadores proceder_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute;n a visitar las localizaciones donde las pistas se encuentran. Cada localizaci_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;oacute;n no puede ser visitada por m_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute;s de un jugador, de manera que, en caso de que dos o m_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute;s quieran dirigirse a la misma, el jugador que m_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute;s corra (utilizando un mayor n_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;uacute;mero de fichas de Carruaje) obtendr_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute; la pista correspondiente, debiendo los dem_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute;s dirigirse a otras localizaciones._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Una vez cada jugador obtenga un destino, todos proceder_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute;n a leer en secreto la pista aparejada a la localizaci_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;oacute;n correspondiente, pudiendo tomar discretamente las anotaciones que estimen pertinentes. Hecho esto, se devolver_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute;n las cartas de pista a su lugar para que los dem_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute;s puedan leerla en rondas posteriores._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Este procedimiento se repetir_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute; cada ronda, hasta que un jugador crea haber hallado la soluci_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;oacute;n al caso: en ese momento, habr_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute; de dirigirse al 221B para comprobar si sus respuestas son acertadas._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;En caso de ser todas correctas, habr_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute; ganado. En caso de error, habr_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute; perdido y se retirar_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute; de la partida._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Cada detective contar_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute;, adem_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute;s, con la inestimable ayuda de una serie de aliados de Sherlock Holmes, as_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;iacute; como con la del propio detective y, sobre todo, la del buen Dr. Watson._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
